labeled_lines.text: 1. Introduction to the Foundation Level Extensions

labeled_lines.text: 2. Introduction to Foundation Level Agile Tester Extension
labeled_lines.label: H1

labeled_lines.text: 3. Overview of the Foundation Level Extension – Agile Tester Syllabus
labeled_lines.label: H1

labeled_lines.text: Chapter 2: Fundamental Agile Testing Principles, Practices, and Processes
labeled_lines.label: H3

labeled_lines.text: Chapter 3: Agile Testing Methods, Techniques, and Tools
labeled_lines.label: H3

labeled_lines.text: This document may be copied in its entirety, or extracts made, if the source is acknowledged.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: The certification for Foundation Level Extension – Agile Tester is designed for professionals who are working within Agile environments.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: The software industry changes rapidly. To deal with these changes and to provide the stakeholders with access to relevant and current information, the ISTQB working groups have created links on the www.istqb.org web site which refer to supporting documents, changes to standards and new occurrences in the industry.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: In general, the Foundation Level syllabus is examinable at a K1 level, i.e., the candidate will recognize, remember and recall terms and concepts stated in the Foundation Level syllabus.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: Building on the Foundation Level, the Agile Tester Extension supports the definition of career paths for professional testers.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: The tester should remember the basic concept of Agile software development based on the Agile Manifesto.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: The tester should understand the advantages of the whole-team approach and the benefits of early and frequent feedback.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: The tester should be able to describe the differences between testing activities in Agile projects and non-Agile projects.
labeled_lines.label: BODY

labeled_lines.text: The tester should be able to recall the concepts of test-driven development, acceptance test-driven development, and behavior-driven development.
labeled_lines.label: BODY
